alert.note: Alert for Grafton (New Hampshire) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued December 23 at 5:52PM EST until December 24 at 10:26AM EST by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 615 PM EST FOR YORK...NORTHEASTERN ROCKINGHAM...CENTRAL STRAFFORD...EAST CENTRAL GRAFTON...NORTHEASTERN BELKNAP AND CARROLL COUNTIES... At 551 PM EST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 11 miles north of Haverhill to near Wolfeboro to near Kittery, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Rochester, Portsmouth, Kittery, Alfred, Sanford, Moultonborough, Ossipee, Meredith, Dover, Somersworth, Kennebunk, Berwick, Farmington, Lebanon, Alton, Holderness, Effingham, Wolfeboro, Wells and South Berwick. This includes the following highways... Interstate 93 between mile markers 85 and 88. Interstate 95 between mile markers 1 and 24. Interstate 95 in New Hampshire near mile marker 16. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
